notes:
Map of landslides triggered by the 25 April Gorkha earthquake. Landslides were mapped by staff at the British Geological Survey, Durham University, and a volunteer group coordinated by NASA-JPL, the University of Arizona, and ICIMOD.
Both Google Earth kml and ArcGIS geodatabase formats are provided.
Satellite data were provided by the International Charter Space and Major Disasters, as well as freely-available online viewers.
Last updated 8 May 2015.
